title: UX Flow Review & Redesign Suggestions
shortDescription: Audit a user flow or prototype for friction points and propose improvements.
jobsToBeDone: Prioritize UX fixes with clear acceptance criteria

inputs.label: Flow Description
inputs.example: User opens chat widget, types question, receives AI response, can escalate to human

inputs.label: Target Persona
inputs.example: Customer seeking quick answers to billing/shipping questions

inputs.label: Success Metric
inputs.example: 80% of queries resolved without human escalation

inputs.label: Constraints
inputs.example: Must work on mobile; POC timeline is 3 days

inputs.label: PRD Reference (optional)
inputs.example: Paste key user stories or requirements from your PRD to validate against

inputs.label: POC/Prototype Notes (optional)
inputs.example: Describe what was built: 'Chat widget with streaming responses, FAQ search, escalate button'
